channel.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Evault_Version6 contains the names of the remote management commands. Currently, only the reboot and power commands for the remote management card exist. Local keyName The name of the remote management command. Type: string Relational requests All requests issued for the remote management command. Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command_Request[]
